body_html:
@yaroslavvb Thx for your advice.
However, I fail to fix the problem. I try replace tf.train.batch with tf.train.shuffle_batch and set min_after_dequeue=10000 to avoid queue starvation (I assume this parameter help fix it, right ?), but my program as slow as before.
What's more, I follow the link that you mentioned to generate timeline. It did take a long time to generate a timeline.json file (600 MB+, with correct .json file format), but failed to be visualized using chrome://tracing and give a blank output. Do you have any idea of what's going wrong ?
